diagnosis.final_diagnosis: White piedra caused by Trichosporon beigelii
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The clinical examination revealed discrete, white, adherent nodules in the hair, which were confirmed by potassium hydroxide mount showing arthrospores and hyphae. Culture on Sabouraud's dextrose agar grew T. beigelii, and additional findings included a synergistic coryneform bacterial infection.
